input.name: login
input.placeholder: Vui lòng nhập Tên đăng nhập

table.style: width:84%; margin-left: 32px; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; position:inherit; border: 2px solid #666666

div.div: Trả trước phí ship nhà xe:

label.t-attf-class: text_center css_attribute_color #{'active' if not inc else ''}
text_center css_attribute_color #{'active' if not inc else ''}

xpath.attribute: container mt8 oe_website_sale_modifier #{(compute_currency(product.lst_price) - product.website_price) > 0.01 and website.get_current_pricelist().discount_policy == 'without_discount' and 'discount'}

div.h4: Product to add in your shopping cart

input.t-att-value: int(line.product_uom_qty) == line.product_uom_qty and int(line.product_uom_qty) or line.product_uom_qty

div.span: Trả trước phí ship nhà xe:

a.t-att-href: keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))

li.t-att-class: 'disabled pager_next' if pager['page']['num'] == pager['page_count'] else None

a.t-att-href: pager['page_next']['url'] if pager['page']['num'] != pager['page_count'] else None
